
This is cool right? You can inline small images in Base64 encoding directly in the text.
Be carefull about the size of images. Source text for rendering view like this is about 15KB in size.

<_image>base64:</_image>

Just add "base64:BASE64_ENCODED_STRING" text inside the _image tag. Example:

<_image>base64:</_image>

Image of giraffe downloaded from <_link>http://openiconlibrary.sourceforge.net/gallery2/?./Icons/others/animals-giraffe.png|Open Icon Library</_link>
